attributes.title: Red Dead 2 EXCLUSIVE NEW DETAILS | Microsoft Buys Obsidian? | Bully 2 Leaked? | Hitman 2 Multiplayer Preview! - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
Welcome to the first episode of Gaming Weekly! Join Adam, Bruce, Alanah, and Lawrence for a weekly look at the biggest stories in gaming!
Want more? Watch the full, uncut episode on RT First!

attributes.title: PS4s BRICKED by Messages? | Epic SUES Fortnite Cheat YouTuber | Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:

attributes.title: Black Ops 4 Wants ALL Your Money?! - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
This week we have special guest Michael Transactions stop by the studio to try and sell you on Call of Duty's new micro transactions, as well as Alanah's review of Diablo 3 on Switch, Paris Games Week announcements, and a rundown of brand new Smash Bros. Ultimate roster additions!



Enjoy the show? Check out the full, unedited version right here: 

link

attributes.title: EVERYONE HATES FALLOUT 76? | The Walking Dead Review - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
Thanks to Enhance for providing a Tetris Effect review code!



Strap in... uh... Fallouters? Fallsies? Fallout Boyz? What do Fallout fans call themselves? Oh well. get ready to have your little irradiated hearts broken because a lot of folks are not happy with Fallout 76 and we're here to tell you why!

[Twitch] Fallout 76 Announcement Stream - https://goo.gl/pGKW7L

attributes.title: Battlefield 5 UNPLAYABLE Because of EA? - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
Gaming Weekly is sponsored by Skillshare. The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/gamingweekly to start your trial now. 



This week the gang breaks down the bonkers rollout schedule for Battlefield 5, as well as a new Half-life game maybe, and more Diablo drama. Plus James screams about Sonic for a while.

attributes.title: Fallout 76 Shouldn't Have Been Released - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
Thanks to the following channels for gameplay:

JuiceHead - https://goo.gl/Zyt4uL

TetraNinja - https://goo.gl/HtUrYU



This week the gang lays out every damn thing wrong with Fallout 76, and boy is there a lot to get through. Plus, Alanah tries to convince the boys to catch all the latest Blickleborps and Frummelplimps in the new Pokemon Let's Go! games. She fails.

attributes.title: Red Dead Online Has TOO MUCH GRIND! - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
This week the gang catches you up on the gruesome horse orgy that is Red Dead Redemption Online! Is there grinding? Sure. Are there jerks anonymously trolling you? Of course. But you know you're gonna play it anyway. Plus, Alanah puts on her best black eyeliner and studded bracelets for a review of Darksiders 3! 

Want more Gaming Weekly? Watch the full live recording on Rooster Teeth! 
https://roosterteeth.com/series/gaming-weekly

attributes.title: Gamers' Choice Awards CRINGE RUNDOWN - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
Go to http://omahasteaks.com and type GW in the search bar to send the Omaha Steaks Family Gift Package today!

This week the gang gets you ready for awards season with sneak previews of The Game Awards and The Gamers Choice Awards and maybe The Academy for Awarding the Choicest Gaming Awards. Plus, Fallout 76 is giving out your personal information and Red Dead gets even better! Enjoy.

attributes.title: Smash Ultimate Online is TRASH - Gaming Weekly
attributes.description:
Go to http://omahasteaks.com/ and enter code "GW" into the search bar for the special $49.99 price on the Family Gift Package!

This week the gang runs down all that's good but mostly bad about Super Smash Bros Ultimate Online, and gives their reviews of all the biggest games announced at this year's Game Awards!

attributes.description:
Learn from project-based, online and local classes on a wide variety of subjects. The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/gamingweekly2 to start your trial now.
